name: STUCKED IN
description:
This game was made over the course of a couple days or so for the 6th Game Breakers Toolkit Jam with the theme being, "Oh no I'm Stuck ._.". 

(Found here: https://itch.io/jam/game-breakers-toolkit-jam-6)

Please do NOT wear headphones when playing this and keep the volume at a reasonable level. I am not responsible for any ear or eye bleeding caused by this hellish abomination. lol 

If the game closes, it's intentional. If it softlocks, it's probably intentional as well. This is a poorly made game done on purpose, so please don't report bugs found in it or say it is unbeatable. It was probably done on purpose. Thank you and have a wonderful time. <3
